categories.name: Delna Switchgears
categories.description: Ensure complete electrical safety and performance with Delna Switchgears, engineered for superior circuit protection, high fault breaking capacity, and long-term durability. Designed to protect residential, commercial, and industrial electrical systems from overloads, short circuits, and power surges with precision internal mechanisms and high-grade materials for reliable tripping and smooth switching.

productRange.name: MCB (Miniature Circuit Breaker)
productRange.details: High-performance C Curve MCB with 10kA breaking capacity for accurate overload and short circuit protection.

productRange.name: TPN MCB (Triple Pole & Neutral)
productRange.details: Three-phase protection solution suitable for commercial and industrial distribution boards.

productRange.name: DPS (Surge Protection Device)
productRange.details: Advanced surge protection for safeguarding sensitive equipment from voltage spikes and lightning surges.

productRange.name: Isolators (2 Pole & 4 Pole)
productRange.details: Heavy-duty isolators for safe manual disconnection during maintenance and service operations.

productRange.name: Changeover Switch (2P / 4P)
productRange.details: Smooth and safe transition between power sources for uninterrupted supply.
